title: מחפשים עבודה? 10 משרות חדשות ופנויות בהייטק
description: ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות טריות מהלוחות שלנו עם כל הפרטים הרלוונטים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטים עבורכם
articleBody:
ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות טריות מהלוחות שלנו עם כל הפרטים הרלוונטים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטים עבורכם

קרדיט תמונה: Getty Images Israel
אחת המטרות לשמן ייסדנו את גיקטיים היתה לקדם את קהילת ההייטק בארץ. בפוסט הגיקג’וב השבועי, אנחנו מפרסמים חלק מהמשרות המפורסמות בלוח משרות ההייטק החדש של גיקטיים. אם אתם מעוניינים למצוא משרות נוספות או לפרסם משרות שלכם, אתם מוזמנים לעשות זאת באמצעות לוח המשרות החדש שלנו – Geeklist. שתפו את הפוסט והעבירו הלאה כדי לעזור לחברות להפיץ את המשרות ולגולשי גיקטיים למצוא את העבודה החדשה שהם מחפשים.
Check Point is looking for Professional Services consultant to be responsible for:
– Full time PS consultant for MOD.
– Deliver on-site consulting services (Design, Implementations & Training) in IL.
– Working in conjunction with the local PS team.
Requirements:
– Practical experience with Check Point products a must. Experience with Blue-Coat and VSX is an advantage.
– 4+ years of experience with IP based networks, network design, and security products.
– Experience with several different operating systems: Windows 9x/2000, Unix- based.
– Installation, implementations and operation of Check Point products.
– Experience in working with customers.
– Willingness to learn new technologies, self-learner.
– Customer oriented – experienced with direct face to face service.
To send a CV for the position of Professional Services Consultant – Check Point
The position will include content writing, marketing writing, site analysis/auditing, editing, management of freelancers and overall working with our SEO teams to improve the quality of our sites. The candidate should have experience working on website copy.
Responsibilities:
Analyzing web copy and improving text
Delivering high-quality texts for our websites (including marketing and social)
Managing a team of freelancers and translators
Writing marketing content for newsletters, ads, etc.
Researching new trends in content
Requirements:
– Experience in marketing writing (required).
– Experience in site auditing.
– Experience in the online casino industry – a plus.
– Native English speaker.
Required attributes:
– Strong attention to detail, especially grammar rules and stylistics.
– Ability to write in many voices.
– Organized.
– Ability to multi-task.
– Proficiency with Word.
– Knowledge of WordPress, Content Management Systems a plus.
To send a CV for the position of Content Specialist – Webpals
Want to be part of a new exciting team? We are looking for smart, ambitious, tech guru developers to join our cross development team!
The cross team is responsible for tasks inside and outside the R&D road map and sprints, such as innovation projects, technologic bottlenecks, POCs and more. As part of this team you will be working with wide technology stacks in web, backend and mobile.
If you are more flexible then Nadia Comanche, love new challenges and can jump between different technologies like a rabbit, we are looking for YOU!
Requirements:
– 5+ years of development experience in at least 3 technologies of the following: NodeJs, ReactJs, Java, php,  python, HTML5/CSS3, native iOS/Android, Angular.
– Experience in working with databases (Relational and non-relational).
– Experience in OO design and development.
– Startup spirit person, who is passionate about technology and building smart products.
To send a CV for the position of Software Engineer – Cross Development Team – Como
– Gather and analyze data, identify key prediction/classification problems, design solutions and build prototypes, using machine learning, advanced techniques and algorithms.
– Develop new analytics, algorithms and data processing chains to create insights from IoT data.
– Collaborate with product management to understand the domain, problems’ space and product analytics’ requirements.
– Conduct research and coordinate work with peers and external partners.
– Work with development team to bring insights from idea inception, through research to implementation and integration in a scalable technology stack.
– Stay current on published state-of-the-art algorithms and competing analytics technologies.
Requirements:
– MSc in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics or a related discipline- an advantage.
– At-least 3 years’ experience in data science and algorithms research and development.
– Strong analytical skills, with proven track record including publications, development and deployment experience.
– Solid foundation and background in machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques, with broad understanding of supervised and unsupervised learning methods and algorithms.
– Experience working with modern programming languages: Python, Java, R, Matlab for interactive data research, algorithms and analytics packages development.
– Practical experience with: sensor data, big data and complex data processing chains is a big plus.
– Experience working within cross-disciplinary teams in a dynamic, fast paced environment.
– Fluent in English (written and verbal), other languages are a plus.
To send a CV for the position of Data Scientist – AGT International
We are looking for a Risk Investigator to join our Risk department
The Risk Investigator’s job, in a nutshell, is to deter would-be abusers of our platform, ensure a safe environment for our users, and to protect our Clients and Payoneer from fraud. What we do has a direct impact on not only Payoneer’s bottom line, but also that of our Clients.
– Computer and Internet fluency
– Control of Microsoft Office Suite, especially Excel, Powerpoint, Word, and Project
– Solid foundation of SQL
– Excellent spoken and written English
Requirements:
– Be smart but humble.
– Love to help others and be a great team player.
– Be curious and driven to explore and improve.
– Be able to multi-task in a very fast-paced workplace.
– Have a sharp eye for details and the ability to retain a vast amount of information.
– Be creative enough to find solutions while working within the confines of deadlines and limits.
– Love solving puzzles and be tenacious enough to see them through.
– Be equally comfortable sifting through large datasets to find patterns in the noise and getting granular to pick out hidden nuances that could be the key to unlock a case.
To send a CV for the position of Risk Investigator – Payoneer
NI is a digital commerce company that connects engaged consumers with valuable brands.
We exist to simplify consumer decision-making, and we do so by creating trusted comparison websites that nurture and enable high-value relationships between consumers and the brands they choose.
Our clients, some of which are among the most prominent websites worldwide, utilize our platform to enhance their online presence.
We are looking for a Facebook Account Manager to join our vibrant online marketing group.
Responsibilities:
Manage and expand the company’s Facebook activities across various verticals
Work closely with other departments to optimize performance from an in-depth understanding of the company’s business needs
Form and execute a strategic work plan to increase the volume of traffic from Facebook
Requirements:
– Over 2 years of experience managing significant Facebook accounts with an emphasis on performance.
– Managed at least 4 personal social accounts (Facebook, Instagram, Tumbler, Google+, Pinterest, personal blog, Twitter, Quara, LinkedIn, etc.).
– Familiarity with online marketing channels (PPC- must, SEO- advantage).
– Experience in international markets.
– Experience in advertising automation services.
– Exceptional analytical and communication skills.
To send a CV for the position of Facebook Account Manager – Natural Intelligence
We are looking for an experienced, creative and innovative System Architect to join our R&D team. The System Architect will be responsible for our core technologies’ full lifecycle; from initiation to design, architecture, development, integration and deployment.
The System Architect has a key position in our team, impacting technology and leading data solutions, while working with most recent products, on sophisticated, large-scale data platforms and environments.
Join us to develop a real-time, high traffic system that works with cutting-edge technology and BigData DBs.
Lead the design and development of the system, from its core to every functionality on a high paced and dynamic environment.
Requirements:
– At least 2 years’ experience as a software architect
– Vast proven experience in web technologies, including backend server programming and web application programming
– Vast proven experience in designing and developing complex high scale, low latency systems
– Significant Experience in Java (7 and up) multithreaded programming
– Experience in cloud development under Amazon Web Services and/or Google Cloud Platform
– Experience in working with various NoSQL databases like Couchbase, Redis, ElasticSearch & OrientDB
– Experience in web/application server stacks, including Tomcat and NginX
– Experience in designing and building SAAS systems
– Experience in developing and deploying code in Linux OS based environments
– Familiarity with Spring MVC, Spring DI and Spring Boot
– Familiarity with Maven
– Excellent design and analytical skills and problem solving skills
– Excellent ability in finding, learning, testing and using new technologies
– Leader by nature with the ability to plan and execute complex development tasks
– Fluent English
To send a CV for the position of System Architect – Brightcom
– עיצוב קמפיינים אונלייניים, אתרים, תקשורות מייל, מדיה חברתית, גרפיקות אנימטיביות וחומרים נוספים בהתאם לדרישות הביזנס.
– יצירת חומרים נוספים כגון מצגות, הדגמות, וכו’.
– עבודה בשיתוף פעולה עם מנהלי שיווק על-מנת לפתח עיצובים אטרקטיביים לפרויקטים שיווקיים מרובי-ערוצים.
– עיצוב כולל של חוויית משתמש באמצעות טכניקות לפריסת עמודים, style guides, סכמות צבע, ועיצוב ממשקי משתמשים.
– התעדכנות שוטפת בטרנדים, סגנונות, וטכנולוגיות בתעשייה.
– הנחלת סטנדרט גבוה למותג, והבטחת התאמה של כל החומרים להנחיות המיתוג.
דרישות:
– תואר ראשון בעיצוב גרפי – יתרון (ניסיון בweb).
– 3 שנות ניסיון לפחות בעיצוב עבור אונליין.
– יכולת השלמת עבודת עיצוב על פרוייקט, מקונספט ועד סיום.
– יכולת לעבוד על מספר משימות בו-זמנית, תוך התייחסות לפרטים ותעדוף על-מנת לעמוד בזמני הגשה.
– כישורי תכנון וארגון חזקים מוכחים.
– יכולות בין-אישיות מעולות.
– ידע נרחב ומעמיק בAdobe Creative Suite:  Photoshop, Illustrator, Flash.
– תיק עבודות המראה על יכולות עיצוב מעולות במספר מדיומים הכולל web, מובייל, ודפוס.
* נבקש להמציא תיק עבודות בהתאם לדרישה.
To send a CV for the position of Graphic Designer – 888
We are looking for a talented QA Engineer to build a smooth, scalable and comprehensive quality assurance pipeline.
In this position you will:
– Carry out vigorous testing through a rich web-based UI.
– Develop testing tools, write test plans, and also set up and maintain testing environments to enable higher quality across the development process.
– Throughout your work you will be expected to see the world through the eyes of our cyber analyst users, and be able to spot fine nuances to maintain top quality standards.
Requirements:
– 2+ years of experience in testing web applications, including client and server side – a must
– Good system-wide view
– Experience in client – server, web based applications’ QA
– System and network architecture knowledge
– Attention to detail and the ability to see the product as a whole
– Excellent personal communications skills
– Strong self management capabilities: proactivity, initiative and innovation
– Good understanding of IT & networking world
– Fluent English (reading and writing) – a must
– Experience and understanding of cyber security – a big advantage
To send a CV for the position of QA Engineer – Cybereason
TGS is looking for MS CRM dynamics expert, to join the significant and growing share of Dynamics CRM in the organization technology.
Requirements:
– In-depth hands-on knowledge of the Microsoft Dynamics CRM platform.
– 1-2 years’ Experience Dynamics CRM developer, 2013 and above.
– Knowledge in design and develop .NET, plugins, HTML JavaScript’s and Web services.
– Strong knowledge and experience of implementing and customization of MS Dynamics CRM in large organizations (version 2013 and above).
– Experience in create and update entities and forms, Define Business processes, complex WF and business rules.
– Fast learning and independent working abilities.
– Good communication skills.
– Responsible and multi-tasking capability.
– Excellent English level.
– Willing to travel occasionally.
To send a CV for the position of CRM Dynamics Developer – TGS
